channel.title: Startups on wazihub
channel.description: Recent content in Startups on wazihub

item.title: WAZIHUB Launched in Kampala, Uganda
item.description: WAZIHUB, an Internet of Things Innovation program, launched today in Kampala, Uganda, as a collaborative problem solving and innovative approach to foster creation of IoT products and services. The launch took place at HiveColab, one of the consortium partners based in Sub-Saharan Africa. HiveColab is an innovation hub and startup incubator in Kampala.
